Text:
Hey skJGZV6z, thanks a ton for all the Stossel torrents! You're a saviour!
However, I'm having a problem downloading just two, 'Drug War Disaster (2010/06/17)' and 'The Trouble with Lawyers (2010/07/08)'... Could you possibly reseed those? I'd be really grateful!
As of the time on this comment, I am reseeding those for you. Add comments to the most recent episode listing if you're having trouble. Thx!
